What is the purpose of the `listopenoffers` command in Verus?
The `listopenoffers` command is used to show outstanding offers in the wallet.

listopenoffers (unexpired) (expired)' Shows offers outstanding in this wallet Arguments  unexpired        (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are not expired  expired         (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are expired Result  all open offers
